title: Luxury Living on a Budget! Ready for Move-In! Call Today
map_address: 833 Dawn Redwood Court near Wedgewood Hills Drive
posting_body: You will enjoy all the upgrades included in this NEW home!
And you will LOVE how affordable it is to become the happy homeowner of this gorgeous home!!
Call us TODAY to find out how easy the process can be and take your first step to homeownership!
Luxury Plank Flooring, Polished Granite Countertops, 42” Upper Cabinetry
Convenient access to the rapidly growing shopping, dining, and employment centers of both Conroe and The Woodlands
Fishable lake with extended pier, paved walking trails, community park, children’s playground, tennis court, zoned to highly acclaimed Conroe ISD, incredible nearby attractions.
* P & I. Price $343,900, 5.625% Fixed/ 6.713% APR, 3.5% Down, FHA 30 Year, OAC from third party lender.
Other fees such as taxes, insurance and HOA are not included in the sample monthly payment amount.
Prices and rates are subject to change without notice.
